title:
LK 2 Pack for Google Pixel 8 Screen Protector with 2 Pack Camera Lens Protector, HD Ultra-thin, 9H Hardness Tempered Glass Screen Protector for Pixel 8; fingerprint Compatible; Military-grade shatterproof; screen protection and camera lens protection;
original visual experience; high-response haptic touch
descriptions:
**Product Name:** LK 2 Pack for Google Pixel 8 Screen Protector with 2 Pack Camera Lens Protector

**Compatibility:** Google Pixel 8

**Package Contents:**
- 2x Tempered Glass Screen Protectors
- 2x Camera Lens Protectors
- Installation Accessories

**Screen Protector Features:**
- Made from 9H Hardness Tempered Glass for superior durability
- HD Ultra-thin for a sleek profile and original visual quality
- Military-grade shatterproof to withstand impacts
- Edge strengthening design for added protection
- Fingerprint compatible and supports high-response haptic touch for seamless user experience

**Camera Lens Protector Features:**
- Made from 9H Hardness Tempered Glass for scratch resistance and shatterproof protection

**Visual Experience:** High Definition, Original visual quality maintained

**Service:** Lifetime Service with customer support. Expect a response within 24 hours.

This LK 2 Pack for Google Pixel 8 includes everything you need to protect your device. The screen protectors and camera lens protectors are made from 9H Hardness Tempered Glass, ensuring maximum durability and protection against scratches and shatter. The screen protectors are ultra-thin, providing an HD visual experience and maintaining the original visual quality of your device. They are also fingerprint compatible and support high-response haptic touch for a seamless user experience. The camera lens protectors are scratch-resistant and shatterproof, ensuring your camera lenses are well-protected. The package also includes installation accessories for easy application. With lifetime service and 24-hour customer support, you can trust that your device is in good hands.
